CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 23, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "'Little Mommy's' 100th - Friends and relatives joined in celebrating the 100th birthday of Mrs. Susan Blakey, 'Little Mommy,' at the Aged Ministers and Laymen's Home, 605 Oakwood St. Left to right: Mmes. Dorothy Taylor, Carrie Marshall, Ruby Trapp, Mrs. Blakey, John H. Jones, son; Mmes. I. Mesk, Mamie Stewart, Ruth Perry, former superintendent, and Mrs. M. Patrick. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mamie Stewart, I. Mesk, Carrie Marshall, Ruby Trapp, Ruth Perry, Dorothy Taylor, and M. Patrick gathered behind table in Aged Ministers and Laymen's Home, 605 Oakwood Street, Homewood
